ygData.subject: RE: EQ Slowly Dying?
ygData.msgSnippet: Thank you Chas for making your comment.  I ve grown tired of seeing the sniveling and whining going on concerning this game. ... From: Chas Watkins
ygData.messageBody:
Thank you Chas for making your comment. I've grown tired of seeing the
sniveling and whining going on concerning this game.

-----Original Message-----
From: Chas Watkins [mailto:cwatkins@...]
Sent: Thursday, September 09, 1999 12:23 PM
To: 'EQ-Clerics@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] EQ Slowly Dying?


From: Chas Watkins <cwatkins@...>

Get a life.

EQ is not one. Its a game, a fashion if you like, it will flourish for
while. It may be 6 months, it may be years. Other games will come and go,
they will have success and failures too. Some people will move on straight
away, others will wait till they close the servers down and ball their eyes
out. WHO CARES.

Enjoy the game, enjoy your character, enjoy this sense of community. Enjoy
it now. You might be dead in real life in 6 months. So stop worrying, stop
whining...just hang out here with us Clerics. Discuss evening wear, PvP
play, begging if you like... but most of all enjoy life and EQ.





-----Original Message-----
From: John Erik Maynus [mailto:jmaynus@...]
Sent: Thursday, September 09, 1999 10:11 AM
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ-Clerics] EQ Slowly Dying?


From: "John Erik Maynus" <jmaynus@...>

I've been reading on the EQ newsgroup that a good bit of ppl think EQ is
already starting to die. Many are just bored of the game and are quiting or
getting ready to, others are getting tired of Verant changing everything and
some of it is for the worse. I've read where they are saying it's too late
to save EQ, some even say even the new addon will not save it cause it'll
still be the same game with just some new things. And yeah it might spice
it up a bit, but for how long, I give it 3-4 months tops. After 3-4 months
the power gamers will already have the extra lvls, everyone should have been
in all the new zones, had a chance to play the new lizardman race. So once
that happens it's gonna be right back to where it is now.
Some are waiting for Asheron's Call and others are waiting for Middle-Earth
to be released. Will AC or ME finish off EQ? I guess time will tell but
since theres like 3-4 other RPGs coming out by the year 2000 I say one of
them will put an end to EQ. And if EQ does die to fast it's no ones fault
but Verants for not listening to the paying customers, they listen to a few
but not the whole.
Even tho EQ is a very good game it can't or won't be around forever.

**************************
Azor
Lvl 18 Human Cleric of the Rathe
**************************
